wood.name: Wood
wood.description: Basic building material harvested from trees.

stone.name: Stone
stone.description: Durable rock used for tools and structures.

berry.name: Berry
berry.description: A quick snack that keeps hunger away and restores a little stamina.

fiber.name: Fiber
fiber.description: Plant fibers used for bandages and ropes.

water.name: Fresh Water
water.description: Clean water gathered from springs that refreshes stamina.

cooked_berry.name: Cooked Berry
cooked_berry.description: Warm berries that satisfy hunger, add a little heat, and steady stamina.

bandage.name: Bandage
bandage.description: Stops bleeding and restores a bit of health.

raw_meat.name: Raw Meat
raw_meat.description: Freshly harvested meat that should be cooked before eating.

hide.name: Hide
hide.description: Tough animal hide used for leatherworking and armor.

slime_gel.name: Slime Gel
slime_gel.description: Sticky residue from slimes, useful in alchemy.

venom_sac.name: Venom Sac
venom_sac.description: A fragile sac containing toxins, prized by hunters.

stone_knife.name: Stone Knife
stone_knife.description: A basic tool that improves harvesting efficiency.

campfire.name: Campfire
campfire.description: Keeps the player warm and allows simple cooking.
